selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the length of line AB using the given ratio and length of AC.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the expression '2/5 * 25' to calculate the length of AB.

selected_skills.name: map_length_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the calculated length of AB to one of the multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated length and the provided options to find the correct option label.
